Data: Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run length ball bouncing a bit, Clarke is surprised by the lift, and takes a hand off the bat as he drops it on the off side
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run shaping away a tad but far outside off and left alone
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, 1 run that was pitched up and headed for middle stump, or the pads, Clarke got bat in front of both to work it down to fine leg
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run thick outside edge now, Angel is troubling them with the bounce from a good length, the ball dribbles past a diving gully
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run has him reaching out and driving away from the body, the ball is in the air for a bit as it goes to mid off
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run tries to get the front foot across and drive, but mistimes the stroke back to Angelo
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run moves forward and blocks one going across him
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run eases a pitched up ball on the off side, and it takes a dive from Senanayake at extra cover to save runs
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run pushed to extra cover off the front foot
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run pushes the pitched up ball on the off side
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run pushed to cover
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run moves in towards the leg stump and is worked square with the angle
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, 1 run brilliant stop at cover, they have saved quite a few boundaries today, Clarke had reached out and absolutely smashed this length ball as it straightened outside off
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run left alone as it angles across outside off
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run length ball defended towards mid off
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run pitched up and leaving him with the angle, he looks at it and lets it go
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 2 runs worked off the pads through square leg for two
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run bounce from a good length again, but going outside off with the angle and left alone

Prasad to Clarke, no run and he beats Clarke first up with a skiddy length ball that holds its line outside off, they all go up for caught behind, Sanga is convinced totally as usual, HotSpot shows nothing on the bat, replays do not indicate any edge

Prasad to Clarke, 3 runs shortish delivery, Clarke pulls it square with the incoming angle, Sri Lanka save another four, brilliant work from Tharanga, getting his right hand in front to stop the ball just inside the rope
Prasad to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey pulls off the front foot, short ball sitting up and he weaves back to crack it in front of square
Prasad to Hussey, no run 139.8 kph pitched up ball from Prasad, Hussey pushes to covers
Prasad to Hussey, no run well forward, bends the knee, gets low and defends solidly on the off side
Prasad to Hussey, 1 run he likes the short ball, he takes a look at it and launches another meaty pull, they have a man at deep midwicket now
Senanayake to Hussey, no run some bounce from a good length on off stump, defended down the track
Senanayake to Hussey, no run tossed up now, smothered off the front foot
Senanayake to Hussey, no run more bounce this time, Hussey drawn forward by the flight, and is surprised as he defends off the splice
Senanayake to Hussey, no run chopped to point from the crease
Senanayake to Hussey, no run reaches forward to a tossed up full one and pushes to extra cover
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run ends up on leg stump off the final ball, and is worked square
Prasad to Hussey, no run pitched up ball driven hard off the front foot to mid off
Prasad to Hussey, FOUR runs fine shot, Hussey opens the face and drives the length ball through cover, no one's stopping this one
Prasad to Hussey, no run skiddy one angled across and bouncing, left alone
Prasad to Hussey, FOUR runs that was full and headed for the pads, Hussey does well to quickly get bat in front and flick it fine
Prasad to Hussey, 1 run another short ball, another pull from Hussey, deep midwicket comes into play
Prasad to Clarke, no run pitches it up, defended to mid off
Senanayake to Hussey, no run worked towards midwicket as he comes across
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run flighted on middle and leg and turned in front of square
Senanayake to Clarke, no run Clarke uses his feet to spin first ball, and pushes back to the bowler
Senanayake to Clarke, no run draws him down the track with flight, he eases it back again
Senanayake to Clarke, no run fuller one worked to shortish square leg who dives and saves one
Senanayake to Clarke, no run Senanayake gets through another tight over, worked to square leg again
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run gets it to move away and bounce from back of a length, jabbed away behind point
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run worked to midwicket who dives and saves more runs
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run gets forward and across and pushes straight to extra cover
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run pulled in front of square from back of a length
Kulasekara to Hussey, 2 runs guided past point for two

Kulasekara to Hussey, OUT Sri Lanka have bettered their brilliance in the field, Kula ups the standards with a leaping blinder, Hussey pushed half-heartedly at a pitched up delivery, it popped in the air down the pitch to Kula's right, the bowler recovered from his followthrough to leap at the ball one-handed and did not let go of it as he land
Senanayake to Clarke, 2 runs down the track and lofts over extra cover
Senanayake to Clarke, 1 run pushed to long on for one
Senanayake to Hussey, no run beaten on the front foot push by one that does not turn much
Senanayake to Hussey, no run left alone this time as it bounces outside off
Senanayake to Hussey, no run driven towards midwicket
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run pushes hard down to long on
Prasad to Hussey, no run hurried and opened up by a nippy bouncing length ball, defends on the off side
Prasad to Hussey, no run defends the pitched up ball to point
Prasad to Hussey, no run defends a pitched up ball from the crease
Prasad to Hussey, no run Prasad is on target again with the pitched up ball, Hussey defends tightly to point
Prasad to Hussey, 2 runs some width this time from a good length, and he eases it past cover
Prasad to Hussey, no run gets an inside edge on to pad and back to Prasad as he tries to drive a full one
Senanayake to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke deals with the flighted ball with crisp feet, gets to the pitch and smacks it over the bowler
Senanayake to Clarke, no run comes down the track again and works the full one towards midwicket
Senanayake to Clarke, 1 run whipped behind square leg for one
Senanayake to Hussey, no run backs away and cuts the bouncing delivery, a rare fumble from Sri Lanka, at point, no run conceded though

Senanayake to Hussey, FOUR runs Tharanga at mid off drops a very tough chance, Senanayake has been tossing it up consistently, and got Hussey to comes forward and push in the air, it just eluded a leaping Tharanga as he got his fingertips to it
Senanayake to Hussey, SIX runs more flight, Hussey repeats the shot, with more power, with more conviction and this time Tharanga can watch it go sailing over his head for six over long off
Prasad to Clarke, no run gets behind the line and defends a bouncing delivery down the track
Prasad to Clarke, 1 run holds its line outside off from a good length, pushed towards cover for a quick run
Prasad to Hussey, 1 run direct hit would have tested him, whipped across the line to mid on and they charge across for the single, Hussey would have been gone by a foot had the throw hit the stumps
Prasad to Clarke, 1 run worked behind square on leg
Prasad to Hussey, no run stays in the crease and drops a climbing back of a length ball behind point
Prasad to Hussey, no run width for the cut, he plays the shot, finds point in the way
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run moves across and forward and smothers a pitched up ball
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, 1 run works a length ball with the angle wide of mid on
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run left alone outside off
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run wider outside off, he lets it go again
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run going on the pads with the angle, tucked to fine leg
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, 1 wide digs in the bouncer, does too much with the bounce, way over the batsman's head
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run appeal for caught behind down the leg side turned down
Prasad to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey starts well after drinks, leans forward in to the length delivery and times the push past a diving extra cover
Prasad to Hussey, 1 run worked square on the leg side
Prasad to Clarke, no run down leg with the fuller length, superb diving take by Sanga
Prasad to Clarke, 1 run gets forward and across, drives crisply down to sweeper cover
Prasad to Hussey, 1 run gets some width as it bounces from short of a length, and pushes out to sweeper cover
Prasad to Clarke, no run defended solidly off the front foot
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run defends a pitched up ball to mid on
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run cuts hard but straight to backward point
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run bit of an inside edge, to midwicket, as he pushes forward
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run gets the width to launch into another cut, but point leaps to take it one-handed on the bounce
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run whipped off the pads through square leg
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run skiddy full one pushed down the track
Malinga to Hussey, no run starts off with a widish length ball moving away from the right-hander, slapped away to cover
Malinga to Hussey, no run very wide from back of a length, he reaches out and slaps it, finds cover again
Malinga to Hussey, 1 wide bouncer at 138 kph, called wide for height
Malinga to Hussey, 1 wide slings it in full and wide outside off, called wide for width this time
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run gets it right on a good length now, steered to third man
Malinga to Clarke, no run eased to point as he gets forward and across
Malinga to Clarke, no run bouncing from a length, he comes forward and defends solidly to cover
Malinga to Clarke, no run pushed back to the bowler, Malinga coming back well after those wides
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run pitched up at 124.5 kph, pushed away to point
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run ending on middle and off, he shuffles across but cannot work past midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 2 runs thick inside edge through square leg as he pushes hard at a length ball
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run pushed back to the bowler
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run he is keeping it full around the stumps, another thick inside edge dribbles behind square leg

Angelo Mathews to Clarke, FOUR runs superbly timed from Clarke, it seemed a mere work on to the leg side as he came across and turned it through midwicket from outside off, but he had timed it so well that it gave the chasing fielder no chance
Malinga to Hussey, no run scoops a pitched up delivery in the air, just past short extra cover
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run eased off the front foot, point should have stopped that, considering the high standards Sri Lanka have set today in the field
Malinga to Clarke, 3 runs on the pads, he whips well in the air behind square leg, a slide saves one near the rope

Malinga to Hussey, OUT Malinga has broken the stand, leading edge dying on short extra cover, Thirimanne does well to react quickly, goes down to his left to take the catch, David Hussey was looking to turn the length ball on leg
Malinga to Christian, no run phew, that was brave of Christian in the end, this good length delivery just went over the stumps as it came back in
Malinga to Christian, no run gets a touch across and defends the pitched up delivery safely

Prasad to Clarke, no run that has to be close, that is worth a long appeal, Sri Lanka put one in, but get nothing out of it, Prasad implores the umpire as this length ball catches Clarke on the pads after nipping back in, could be height, could be going down leg, replays show it would have just gone over leg stump
Prasad to Clarke, no run flails at this one outside off now, and is beaten as it bounces
Prasad to Clarke, 2 runs this time he gets hold of this widish one and cuts past point
Prasad to Clarke, no run pushed to midwicket

Prasad to Clarke, no run another appeal for leg before, skiddy delivery from Prasad, strikes him in front of middle and leg this time, but high on the flap of the pad, replays show it would have just about touched the top of leg, too much doubt with all the bounce on this pitch
Prasad to Clarke, no run pushes the length ball down the track
Malinga to Christian, no run gets front foot out and defends the length ball
Malinga to Christian, 1 run worked to fine leg
Malinga to Clarke, no run eases forward fluidly and dead-bats the length ball on the off side
Malinga to Clarke, no run searing bouncer, Clarke withdraws from the pull and gets head out of the way as it gets big on him at pace
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run shortish one worked in front of square leg
Malinga to Christian, 1 run goes for the yorker around off stump, he pushes it with an inside edge behind square leg
Prasad to Christian, no run stays in the crease, gets across and defends
Prasad to Christian, FOUR runs neatly done, gets forward and eases the length ball between midwicket and mid on, extremely well timed
Prasad to Christian, FOUR runs well played again, short ball sits up and he swivels to send the pull to the deep square leg boundary
Prasad to Christian, FOUR runs three in a row, through midwicket again, pitched up delivery and for all his power, he shows that he can send them purring along the ground too
Prasad to Christian, no run left alone outside off
Prasad to Christian, no run ends the expensive over with another leave
Senanayake to Clarke, no run

Senanayake to Christian, no run gets forward and defends down the pitch
Senanayake to Christian, no run gets forward again and pushes on the off side
Senanayake to Christian, 1 run whips the full delivery down to long on
Senanayake to Clarke, no run smothers the tossed up ball off the front foot
Dilshan to Christian, no run pushed down the track
Dilshan to Christian, no run a run and a diving stop from Mahela at square leg
Dilshan to Christian, no run defended down the track
Dilshan to Christian, no run advances down the track and works towards midwicket, they are not getting the single again
Dilshan to Christian, no run no run again, Christian wanted it after pushing on the off side, Clarke rightly sends him back
Dilshan to Christian, 1 run gets across and hits down to long on
Senanayake to Christian, no run driven hard down the track
Senanayake to Christian, no run nudged to square leg
Senanayake to Christian, 1 run forces the bouncing length ball down to long on, similar to the carrom ball, in that it was flicked in
Senanayake to Clarke, 1 run worked through square leg

Senanayake to Clarke, no run blocked safely off the front foot

Kulasekara to Christian, 1 run direct hit from Kula as he races to grab the ball after it is inside edged on the off side, finds the stumps at the non-striker's but Clarke is in
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run walks across and works from outside off through midwicket
Kulasekara to Christian, no run worked straight to mid on from off stump
Kulasekara to Christian, no run digs out a full one to mid off
Kulasekara to Christian, no run pushes on the up, but straight to extra cover
Senanayake to Clarke, 1 run backs away outside leg and cuts from leg stump, Chandimal throws himself to his left at cover to stop the ball

Senanayake to Christian, FOUR runs down the track and lofted over midwicket for a one bounce four, not far from deep midwicket but not close enough for him to have a chance to catch it, he was some way in from the boundary
Senanayake to Christian, no run
Senanayake to Christian, no run swept to short fine leg
Senanayake to Christian, SIX runs superb stroke, Christian uses his feet, makes room, and lifts this tossed up ball from off stump over the bowler
Senanayake to Christian, 1 run worked on the leg side

Malinga to Christian, 1 leg bye fired in full on leg, dribbles square off the pad

Malinga to Christian, no run sends in another one close to the blockhole, jammed away
Malinga to Christian, no run slung widish across the right hander outside off
Malinga to Christian, no run one more near-yorker, Christian squeezes it out to mid off
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run moves down the track but pushes straight back to the bowler, who finds the stumps with a direct hit, Clarke is back safely by then
Kulasekara to Clarke, 2 runs slower one at 106 kph, he walks across and works it square on leg
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run well timed, hit powerfully too, but straight to midwicket, moves across and whips the full delivery hard
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run backs away and looks to pull a bouncer than comes in with the angle, beaten
Kulasekara to Clarke, FOUR runs that is very well played, Clarke brings up a steady 50 with a shuffle outside off, and a nudge to send the full delivery fine down leg from middle
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run charges out and slogs to long on for a single
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run whips a full one off middle and leg to deep square leg, that raced across the outfield
Malinga to Christian, 4 leg byes attempted full one goes wrong, low full toss down the pads and is it helped fine with a tickle
Malinga to Christian, 1 run another low full toss, this time on off, whipped with a thick inside edge in front of square
Malinga to Clarke, no run tries to steer a full delivery some way outside off stump, misses
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run yorker slung in close to 140 kph, he scrambles to dig it out wide of mid on
Malinga to Christian, no run bends forward and defends a full one on the off side
Senanayake to Clarke, no run worked with the spin to midwicket
Senanayake to Clarke, 1 run ending on middle, worked square on the leg side
Senanayake to Christian, no run worked straight to midwicket again

Senanayake to Christian, OUT down the track to the flighted delivery, misses the heave as this one does not turn in, Sanga does not miss the take even as the ball bounces, he hops in the air as he collects and the bails are off
Senanayake to Harris, no run gets across and defends a turning length ball
Senanayake to Harris, 1 run pushed towards point
Angelo Mathews to Harris, 1 run worked in front of mid on and Harris lumbers down for the single
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, 1 run turned square on the leg side, they are kept down to one eventually
Angelo Mathews to Harris, 1 run chopped down to sweeper cover for one

Angelo Mathews to Clarke, OUT gone! with more than nine overs to go, Mahela takes out Clarke who is furious at getting out, he worked this length ball in the air from middle and Mahela went low to his right quickly to take the catch at midwicket
Angelo Mathews to McKay, 1 run worked with the angle off the pads in front of square leg
Angelo Mathews to Harris, no run ducks under a short ball
Senanayake to McKay, 1 run pushed off the front foot to long off
Senanayake to Harris, no run turned to midwicket

Senanayake to Harris, no run straightening after being angled in from back of a length, was that the flicked carrom ball, pulled to midwicket
Senanayake to Harris, OUT Australia continue to lose wickets, the top spinner bounces a lot outside off stump, and Harris cuts it straight to backward point
Senanayake to Starc, no run defended down the track off the front foot
Angelo Mathews to McKay, 1 run thick outside edge to third man as he pushes from the crease to a pitched up ball
Angelo Mathews to Starc, no run left alone as it carries across him with the angle from a good length
Angelo Mathews to Starc, no run driven hard but straight to extra cover
Angelo Mathews to Starc, no run brings down a climbing back of a length ball off the high part of the bat
Angelo Mathews to Starc, 1 run drives with an open face, in the air for a while but in the gap past extra cover
Angelo Mathews to McKay, no run punched from the crease to extra cover
Senanayake to Starc, no run beats the edge from around the stumps as Starc pushes inside the line from the crease
Senanayake to Starc, no run tries to force the full one through midwicket but cannot get hold if it
Senanayake to Starc, 1 run worked in front of square leg
Senanayake to McKay, no run slapped away from the crease to extra cover
Senanayake to McKay, 1 run angled across from around the wicket, cut to sweeper cover
Senanayake to Starc, no run pushes a length ball to midwicket
Angelo Mathews to McKay, FOUR runs short ball close to the head, he top-edges the pull way over Sanga
Angelo Mathews to McKay, no run length ball pushed to cover
Angelo Mathews to McKay, 1 run pushed wide of midwicket for one
Angelo Mathews to Starc, no run pitched up ball swung down to mid on
Angelo Mathews to Starc, 2 runs goes for another swing, thickish inside edge dribbles through midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Starc, FOUR runs thick outside edge this time, well wide of the keeper and Malinga cannot save the boundary from third man
Prasad to McKay, no run pushes a length ball to point
Prasad to McKay, FOUR runs McKay gets four, goes after the pitched up ball, and cracks it high over wide long off, falls just inside the rope
Prasad to McKay, 2 runs fuller, and he swings again, this time through midwicket
Prasad to McKay, no run full toss this time, he backs away and has a go at it, mistimes it to mid on
Prasad to McKay, no run now he make room and pull a bouncer, cannot make contact

Prasad to McKay, no run Prasad produces a big outside edge with a skiddy short of a length ball, Sanga takes it in his gloves as he tumbles to his right, but then it pops out, bounces into the ground and lodges back in his gloves, he claimed it initially, but there was some doubt after that, and McKay stays on after the third umpire has a look
Malinga to Starc, no run very full and just outside off first ball, he jabs at it inside the line
Malinga to Starc, 2 runs attempted yorker ends up down the pads and is worked crisply through square leg
Malinga to Starc, 2 runs chipped in the air off the pads, but falls between fine leg and deep square leg
Malinga to Starc, 1 run jabs a low full toss down to third man off a thick edge
Malinga to McKay, no run this one was headed full for middle and leg, but there is no movement and he is able to squeeze it out on the leg side
Malinga to McKay, no run well done, Malinga tries the slower one on the stumps, he bends forward and blocks safely
Prasad to Starc, 1 run drives the pitched up delivery to sweeper cover who keeps them to one
Prasad to McKay, FOUR runs smack! he slogs this full delivery straight down the track, Prasad cannot get to it and the umpire gets out of the way
Prasad to McKay, no run tries to reach out to a widish one but is beaten
Prasad to McKay, 1 run fetches this one from way outside off and mistimes the slog into the leg side
Prasad to Starc, no run pushes a bouncing back of a length ball close to the bowler on the leg side

Prasad to Starc, OUT taken at long off! Starc tries to clobber the length ball down the ground, ends up slicing it in front of long off, the fielder comes in, misjudges the take initially, but does well to tumble forward and grab it in the end
Kulasekara to McKay, 1 run swings the full delivery down to long on, Dilshan runs in and keeps them to one
Kulasekara to Doherty, 1 run driven neatly off the front foot to long off
Kulasekara to McKay, 1 run low full toss hit down to long on for a single
Kulasekara to Doherty, 1 run slogged in the air down to long on
Kulasekara to McKay, 2 runs gets width with the low full toss and scythes it over extra cover
Kulasekara to McKay, 1 run another low full toss eased down to long on, Australia's tail has batted superbly to take them to the last over. They were eight down in the 42nd

Prasad to McKay, OUT outstanding catch in the deep ends the innings, McKay had backed away, Prasad angled the short ball in, McKay smoked it off the middle of the bat, it seemed headed for six over deep midwicket but Thirimanne came screaming in to his left, and reached out with both hands to pouch the ball just as it was about to sail over the

India almost made a mess of a similar target against Sri Lanka on this ground a couple of days ago before a seventh wicket stand got them through. Australia have the attack to make Sri Lanka's chase tougher
Welcome back, Abhishek is on a break, so I, Dustin Silgardo, will take you through the first few overs of the chase. Sri Lanka chasing 232. Ryan Harris to open the bowling for Australia
Harris to Upul Tharanga, no run wide outside off stump and Tharanga leaves it alone
Harris to Upul Tharanga, no run closer to the off stump this time and Tharanga hangs his bat out at it. He drew the bat back to intentionally play inside the line and it goes through to the keeper
Harris to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs short and wide and Tharanga times the square cut nicely for four
Harris to Upul Tharanga, no run targets the stumps this time, on middle stump and Tharanga pushed it to mid-off
Harris to Upul Tharanga, no run fuller on off stump and Tharanga defends. Harris looking to get it closer to the stumps now
Harris to Upul Tharanga, no run beats him. Pitched on middle and angled away. Tharanga plays and missed, and the ball carries through at a good height to the keeper
Starc to Dilshan, no run pushed across and a bit of swing back in to Dilshan, who goes for a big off drive but does not time it
Starc to Dilshan, no run that one did not swing back and Dilshan is beaten outside off stump. Good bounce from Starc
Starc to Dilshan, 1 run swinging back into off stump and goes off the inside edge to square leg
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run that's dropped just short of the keeper. Wide and swinging away from Starc, Tharanga flashes, gets an edge but Wade was standing too far back
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run beauty from Starc. Pitched on off and swinging away. Tharanga is beaten
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run full on off stump and Tharanga pushes to mid-off
Harris to Dilshan, 1 run tucks the length ball with the angle from middle and leg towards midwicket
Harris to Upul Tharanga, 1 run pushed on the off side from the crease
Harris to Dilshan, no run Dilshan looks to carve this one through the off side, but is beaten as this one bounces from a length
Harris to Dilshan, no run cut straight to Ponting at backward point, not clean stop but no run conceded
Harris to Dilshan, FOUR runs smack! when he misses, he looks suicidal, when he hits, he looks amazing, smacked on the up through extra cover
Harris to Dilshan, no run cannot find the gap with the stroke this time, slightly fuller and he hits it to mid off
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run squeezes the full delivery with the away movement to extra cover
Starc to Upul Tharanga, no run beats him this time with sharp away shape from a good length
Starc to Sangakkara, no run that shape away from the great man, Sanga leaves it alone immediately
Starc to Sangakkara, 1 run leans forward to an away going full one and eases it to extra cover
Starc to Dilshan, no run it was only 132.6 kph but it looked much quicker as it zoomed across Dilshan and past his outside edge
Harris to Sangakkara, no run excellent line close to off stump with the angle from over the stumps, Sanga lets it go
Harris to Sangakkara, no run eases forward and across and thumps the front foot drive straight to cover, boy, was that well timed
Harris to Sangakkara, no run worked as it bounces on leg stump, cannot get the single as square leg is around
Harris to Sangakkara, no run digs out a full delivery down the track
Harris to Sangakkara, no run gets across to a length ball and blocks solidly
Harris to Sangakkara, FOUR runs four all the way, superb timing again from Sanga as he pushes forward to a pitched up delivery and dispatches it between extra cover and mid off
Starc to Dilshan, no run could have been played on, full and swinging in late, Dilshan tried to force it through the off side, inside edged it on the full, on the bounce to the keeper
Starc to Dilshan, no run half an appeal for leg before, Dilshan misses the work on the leg side, but this one looked to be headed down leg
Starc to Dilshan, 1 wide acrobatic from Wade, it was headed for four byes as it swung down leg but he went leaping full stretch to take it
Starc to Dilshan, no run poor stroke from Dilshan, stays in the crease and tries to hammer this back of a length ball, it moves in again and beats him totally
Starc to Dilshan, no run much better, right forward and smothers the pitched up ball
Starc to Dilshan, 1 run worked with the movement towards midwicket
Starc to Sangakkara, no run gets across and defends
Harris to Dilshan, no run pushes a full delivery off the front foot to mid off
Harris to Dilshan, no run nothing shot from Dilshan, just has a loose and quick waft at one going some way outside off, beaten
Harris to Dilshan, no run tries to hammer the pitched up ball through point, mistimes it to the man
Harris to Dilshan, 1 run full one pushed wide of mid off for a single
Harris to Sangakkara, no run leaves alone a 147 kph length delivery outside off stump
Harris to Sangakkara, no run another leave outside off
Starc to Dilshan, no run inside edge dribbles off pad on to leg side as he tries to flick one swinging in full
Starc to Dilshan, no run another full delivery moving in, slammed with lots of bottom hand straight to mid on
Starc to Dilshan, FOUR runs crack! too much width for once from Starc, Dilshan plonks front foot out and flays it past extra cover
Starc to Dilshan, no run one more inside edge on to pad as he tries to smack this length delivery through the off side again
Starc to Dilshan, no run pitched up much closer to off now, he defends, for once

Clarke to Chandimal, OUT oh boy, he's struck first ball, the Australia captain, angled in on a length, carrying in towards leg stump, Chandimal gets across in the crease, misses the work on leg, and is struck in front, looked to be hitting leg, will have to see replays, which show that it would have just shaved the top of leg stump

McKay to Malinga, no run has a slog at a wide slower one and is beaten
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run dealing exclusively in variations of the slower one, he has a go at this one and is beaten
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run can't get it away again, he is bowling slower ones and more slower ones, but they are still unable to get them away

McKay to Prasad, no run bends forward to push at a 109 kph pitched up ball and the thick edge balloons in the air but falls short of point
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs worked behind square leg, the throw is high to Wade, he leaps in the air to collect it and by the time he takes the bails off, Angelo is home with a dive

Starc to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs dabbed wide of third man for a couple

Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run runs a full delivery to third man
Starc to Prasad, 1 run they want the single, drops it in front of point, and Angelo charges across, Prasad was slow to get going but Ponting could not pick up the ball cleanly
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run drives down to long off to keep the strike
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run McKay continues to confuse Sri Lanka with the slower ones, Angelo looks to cut hard, but cannot connect
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run oh well, beaten yet again, with the slower one, McKay smiles
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs finally he charges out and lofts over extra cover, Christian runs in hard from long off, dives across and parries the ball in near the rope
McKay to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs he gets the short ball away, it was angled in on leg, he got enough on it to help it over and wide of short fine leg
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run connects with the cut this time, but cannot beat backward point
McKay to Prasad, no run Prasad survives the last ball of the over, he hops and brings down the short of a length ball
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run digs out a full delivery back to the bowler
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run slaps a wide delivery to extra cover, Warner has a go at the stumps, misses, the non-striker was not even in the frame

Starc to Prasad, 3 runs Prasad pulls, pulls well, it requires a dive by the chasing fielder near the rope to save the boundary, they have taken three, Angelo is back on strike, can Sri Lanka pull something off?

Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run good stop from Clarke at midwicket on the edge of the circle, Angelo takes the single to get to his 50, another fighting innings after he has been left to salvage matters with the tail
Starc to Prasad, FOUR runs make it nine for the over now, Prasad stands in the crease and hammers a length ball straight past the umpire for four
Starc to Prasad, 1 run ten for the over with a single down to third man

McKay to Prasad, 2 runs scooped over the bowler towards the straight boundary, excellent work from long off running across, his back leg is over the rope but not touching the ground, his front leg is near the rope but not touching it as he saves a couple of runs
McKay to Prasad, 1 run gets across and nudges on the leg side to bring Angelo on strike
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs smashes the short of a length ball through vacant midwicket for a couple
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run slower one dabbed to backward point for one
McKay to Prasad, no run swing and a miss from Prasad as he steps out of his crease
McKay to Prasad, 2 runs whips a back of a length ball through midwicket, comes back for the second, Angelo is on strike for the last over with 18 needed
Starc to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs Angelo gets the boundary off the first ball, hammers the shortish delivery through midwicket, man in the deep puts in the dive but touches the ropes

Starc to Angelo Mathews, SIX runs Angelo has put Sri Lanka on the brink, what a stroke under pressure, takes on the pitched up ball, gets front leg out of the way and mows it over long off, punches the air as soon as he sees the ball sail away
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run swings a full delivery on the leg side, gets only one this time to deep square leg
Starc to Prasad, 1 run low full toss, he somehow drops it towards point, and they take on the throw, direct hit and he was gone, Ponting has his hands on his head, Angelo is back on strike

Starc to Angelo Mathews, OUT but he has holed out, oh dear, heartbreak for Angelo and Sri Lanka, Australia and Starc can breathe now, makes room for the short ball, winds up and has a crack at it, but can only spoon it in the air as far as long on, Australia get together, they will be a relieved lot

They were one hit away Sri Lanka. What a spunky last-wicket partnership, Angelo has been involved in a few now, what a cool bat he is. Prasad showed plenty of fight. The short ball was there to be hit but Angelo could not manage to clear long on. Australia have sneaked away with this one. Doherty's outstanding return of 2 for 24 in ten overs was not i
Clarke is the choice for the Man of the Match. Well.
That is it from us for this game. Read Brydon Coverdale's report. Abhishek Purohit signing off for the moment. Cheers, and don't let it go down to the wire.
Australia won by 5 runs
Player of the match is Michael Clarke, AUS
